title: Academic Listening Test 5 — Innovation & Society
transcript: The recordings include a customer arranging a makerspace membership, a presentation about a science centre, a panel of entrepreneurs refining a pitch, and a lecture on responsible innovation.

questions.prompt: Which membership tier does the customer choose?
Which equipment induction is booked first?
What safety course must be completed online?
How many guest passes are included per month?
Which payment method does the customer use?
How many new interactive zones are opening?
Which age group is the robotics lab designed for?
What is the name of the evening lecture series?
How many volunteers are needed for the opening weekend?
Which transport discount is offered to visitors?
Which market segment does the mentor urge them to prioritise?
What monthly subscription price do they settle on in pounds?
Which competitor is cited as a benchmark?
Which pilot partner agrees to test the platform?
How many weeks will the beta test run?
